mapper.select: SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, /* 1차통지 거래일자 */ MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, /* 1차통지 전문번호 */ MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, /* 국코드 */ MNG.mac_no, /* 단말번호 */ '', '', '', MNG.arrival_date, /* 도착일자 */ MNG.arrival_time, /* 도착시간 */ SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1) call_class, /* 출동요청구분 */ DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, /* 업체 출동자명 */ DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, /* 업체 출동자 전화번호 */ substr(MNG.org_msg,1,100) memo, /* 메모사항 */ SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, /* 출동사유 */ '', '', '', MNG.site_cd org_site_cd, /* 코너코드 */ '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '0WC' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) ) /* AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31') */ AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd(+) AND MNG.error_cd = ERR.error_cd(+) AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, DECODE( substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '2', '', DECODE(substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '8', '', MNG.mac_no ) ) mac_no, /* 민원출동은 기번 없이 feedback */ RPAD(NVL(MNG.CRT_NO,' '),15,' ') /* CRT(15)+출동요청차수(2)+집계분류코드(2) */ || LPAD(MNG.ORG_CALL_CNT,2,'0') || RPAD(MNG.GROUP_ERROR_CD,2,' ') error_msg, MNG.send_date, MNG.send_time, MNG.arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(MNG.arrival_time), 4 , MNG.arrival_time||'00', MNG.arrival_time ) arrival_time, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1)||DECODE(SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1), NULL, '1', SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1)) call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, '', '', '', MNG.SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 15), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '039' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL /* AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL */ AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) /* 도착예정이 은행에서 99 오류로 준것도 도착을 보내도록 한다. */ OR MNG.org_send_yn = 'a' ) /*AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31')*/ /* sec : 출동요청구분 + 사유로 구성 */ AND MNG.sec IS NOT NULL AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+) /* 2차출동요청에대한 키지원일경우 제외 */ AND substr(MNG.sec, 3, 1) || MNG.ERROR_CD <> '2WR903'

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.BRANCH_CD brch_cd, /* DECODE( substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '2', '', DECODE(substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '8', '', MNG.mac_no ) ), 민원출동은 기번 없이 feedback */ MNG.MAC_NO, RPAD(NVL(MNG.CRT_NO,' '),15,' ') /* CRT(15)+출동요청차수(2)+집계분류코드(2) */ || LPAD(MNG.ORG_CALL_CNT,2,'0') || RPAD(MNG.GROUP_ERROR_CD,2,' ') error_msg, MNG.send_date, MNG.send_time, MNG.arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(MNG.arrival_time), 4 , MNG.arrival_time||'00', MNG.arrival_time ) arrival_time, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1)||DECODE(SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1), NULL, '1', SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1)) call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, '', '', '', MNG.SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 15), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '020' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL /* AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL */ AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) /* 도착예정이 은행에서 99 오류로 준것도 도착을 보내도록 한다. */ OR MNG.org_send_yn = 'a' ) /*AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31')*/ /* sec : 출동요청구분 + 사유로 구성 */ AND MNG.sec IS NOT NULL AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+) /* 2차출동요청에대한 키지원일경우 제외 */ AND substr(MNG.sec, 3, 1) || MNG.ERROR_CD <> '2WR903'

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, ERR.error_msg, '', '', MNG.arrival_date, MNG.arrival_time, '3' call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, '1' call_type, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '035' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND ( (NVL(MNG.org_send_yn, '0') = '0' OR NVL(MNG.org_send_yn, '0') = '1' ) ) AND SUBSTR(MNG.error_cd, 1, 3) <> 'ERR' AND SUBSTR(MNG.error_cd, 1, 3) <> 'USR' AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd(+) AND MNG.error_cd = ERR.error_cd(+) AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, '', '', '', MNG.arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(MNG.arrival_time), 4 , MNG.arrival_time||'00', MNG.arrival_time ) arrival_time, '', DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, '', '', '', '', '', MNG.org_site_cd, '', MNG.create_time, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 15), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '011' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.format_type = '21' AND ( nvl(MNG.org_send_yn, '0') = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND nvl(MNG.org_send_yn, '0') = '0' ) /* 도착예정이 은행에서 99 오류로 준것도 도착을 보내도록 한다. */ OR nvl(MNG.org_send_yn, '0') = 'a' ) AND MNG.org_msg_no IS NOT NULL AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

SELECT MNG.create_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, CASE WHEN LENGTH(MNG.ERROR_CD) = 2 THEN MNG.ERROR_CD ELSE (SELECT CD_NM2 FROM OP.T_CM_COMMON WHERE LARGE_CD = '1130' AND CD_NM3 = ERR.ORG_CD AND CD_NM1 = ERR.GROUP_ERROR_CD) END AS error_msg, '', '', MNG.arrival_date, MNG.arrival_time, '' AS call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, 'NICE', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) AS arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, REPLACE(substrb(MNG.MSG,1,100), x'0a', ' ') memo, '', '', '', '', MNG.SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '031' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '1' AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd AND MNG.ERROR_CD = ERR.ERROR_CD AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+) /* 차세대 후 FKM 기기 오류로 올라오는것 (정상이나 장애로 설정되는것 ) 제외 */ AND MNG.error_cd || nvl(MNG.made_err_cd, '0') <> '9900000'

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, DECODE( substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '2', '', DECODE(substr( MNG.sec, 1, 1 ), '8', '', MNG.mac_no ) ) mac_no, /* 민원출동은 기번 없이 feedback */ RPAD(NVL(MNG.CRT_NO,' '),15,' ') /* CRT(15)+출동요청차수(2)+집계분류코드(2) */ || LPAD(MNG.ORG_CALL_CNT,2,'0') || RPAD(MNG.GROUP_ERROR_CD,2,' ') error_msg, MNG.send_date, MNG.send_time, MNG.arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(MNG.arrival_time), 4 , MNG.arrival_time||'00', MNG.arrival_time ) arrival_time, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1)||DECODE(SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1), NULL, '1', SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1)) call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, '', '', '', MNG.SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 10), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '088' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL /* AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL */ AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) /* 도착예정이 은행에서 99 오류로 준것도 도착을 보내도록 한다. */ OR MNG.org_send_yn = 'a' ) /*AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31')*/ /* sec : 출동요청구분 + 사유로 구성 */ AND MNG.sec IS NOT NULL AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+) /* 2차출동요청에대한 키지원일경우 제외 */ AND substr(MNG.sec, 3, 1) || MNG.ERROR_CD <> '2SH903' union all SELECT TRANS_DATE trans1_date, ORG_MSG_NO trans1_seq, branch_cd brch_cd, MAC_NO, RPAD(' ',15,' ') /* CRT(15)+출동요청차수(2)+집계분류코드(2) */ || LPAD(ORG_CALL_CNT ,2,'0') error_msg, send_date, send_time, arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(arrival_time), 4 , arrival_time||'00', arrival_time ) arrival_time, DECODE(CALL_CLASS, NULL, ' ', CALL_CLASS)||DECODE(CALL_CNT_TYPE, NULL, ' ', CALL_CNT_TYPE ) call_class, DECODE(COM_MAN_NM, NULL, '나이스', COM_MAN_NM ) arrival_nm, DECODE(COM_MAN_TEL_NO , NULL, '0800228252', OP.FC_FN_SECURITY(COM_MAN_TEL_NO, '2') ) arrival_tel_no, substr(ORG_MSG , 1, 100) memo, CALL_TYPE, '', '', '', SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG_MADE_COM WHERE ORG_CD = '088' AND ( ORG_SEND_YN = '2' OR ( ORG_SEND_YN = '1' AND ARRIVAL_EST_TIME IS NULL ) ) AND ARRIVAL_TIME IS NOT NULL AND ORG_MSG_NO IS NOT NULL

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.BRANCH_CD brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, LPAD(MNG.org_call_cnt, 2, '0') error_msg, MNG.send_date, MNG.send_time, MNG.arrival_date, DECODE( LENGTH(MNG.arrival_time), 4 , MNG.arrival_time||'00', MNG.arrival_time ) arrival_time, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1)||DECODE(SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1), NULL, '1', SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1)) call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, '', '', '', MNG.SITE_CD org_site_cd, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 15), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '032' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL /* AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL */ AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) /* 도착예정이 은행에서 99 오류로 준것도 도착을 보내도록 한다. */ OR MNG.org_send_yn = 'a' ) /*AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31')*/ /* sec : 출동요청구분 + 사유로 구성 */ AND MNG.sec IS NOT NULL /*OR MNG.ERROR_CD = 'AFTMNG') ==> 정산처리는 도착 전문 없음*/ AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+) AND MNG.error_cd <> 'AFTMNG' and LENGTH(mng.mac_no) = 3 and MNG.org_msg_no is not null

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, ERR.error_msg, MNG.send_date, MNG.send_time, MNG.arrival_date, MNG.arrival_time, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1) call_class, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 2, 1) call_type, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '081' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '1' AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31') AND MNG.org_msg_no is not null AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd(+) AND MNG.error_cd = ERR.error_cd(+) AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, MNG.mac_no, ERR.error_msg, /* 도착예정없이 도착할 경우 예정시간을 도착시간과 동일하게 송신 처리 -> 외환은행 요청 */ DECODE(MNG.ARRIVAL_EST_TIME, NULL, MNG.arrival_date, MNG.ARRIVAL_EST_DATE) send_date, DECODE(MNG.ARRIVAL_EST_TIME, NULL, MNG.arrival_time, MNG.ARRIVAL_EST_TIME||'00') send_time, MNG.arrival_date, MNG.arrival_time, '', DECODE(MNG.recv_user_nm, NULL, DECODE(MNG.recv_user_uid, NULL, '나이스', MBR.member_nm), MNG.recv_user_nm) arrival_nm, DECODE(MBR.nice_hp, NULL, '0800228252', MBR.nice_hp) arrival_tel_no, MNG.org_msg memo, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '005' AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND ( ( MNG.org_send_yn = '0' AND MNG.arrival_time is NOT NULL AND MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL ) OR ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL ) ) AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31') AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd(+) AND MNG.error_cd = ERR.error_cd(+) AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

SELECT MNG.trans_date trans1_date, /* 장애발생일자 */ MNG.org_msg_no trans1_seq, /* 출동요청일련번호 */ MNG.branch_cd brch_cd, /* 지점번호 */ MNG.mac_no, /* 기기번호 */ RPAD(NVL(MNG.CRT_NO,' '),15,' ') /* CRT(15)+출동요청차수(2)+집계분류코드(2) */ || LPAD(MNG.ORG_CALL_CNT,2,'0') || RPAD(MNG.GROUP_ERROR_CD,2,' ') error_msg, '', '', MNG.arrival_date, /* 도착일자 */ MNG.arrival_time, /* 도착시각 */ SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 1, 1)||DECODE(SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1), NULL, '1', SUBSTR(MNG.sec, 3, 1)) call_class, /* 출동구분(1)+출동차수구분(1) */ '', '', MNG.remark memo, /* 메모사항(BIGO전송. 운총방정호과장20130813 */ '', '', '', '', MNG.ORG_SITE_CD, /* 코너코드 */ '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' FROM OP.T_CT_ERROR_MNG MNG, OP.T_CM_MEMBER MBR, OP.T_CT_ERROR ERR WHERE MNG.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR((SYSDATE - 3), 'YYYYMMDD')) AND MNG.org_cd = '003' AND MNG.arrival_time IS NOT NULL AND MNG.send_time IS NOT NULL AND ( MNG.org_send_yn = '1' OR ( MNG.arrival_est_time IS NULL AND MNG.org_send_yn = '0' ) ) AND (MNG.format_type = '21' OR MNG.format_type = '31') AND MNG.org_cd = ERR.org_cd(+) AND MNG.error_cd = ERR.error_cd(+) AND MNG.recv_user_uid = MBR.member_id(+)

select mng.org_cd, CASE WHEN mng.org_cd = '031' THEN '0'||mng.branch_cd ELSE mng.branch_cd END as brch_cd, mng.site_cd, mng.mac_no, mng.create_date, mng.error_no, mng.recv_user_uid, mng.arrival_date, mng.arrival_time, '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '' from op.t_ct_error_mng mng, op.t_cm_site_01 site where mng.close_yn in ( '1', '2', '3', 'A', 'B', 'C', 'D', 'X', 'Y' ) AND mng.ARRIVAL_TIME IS NOT NULL /* ( mng.ARRIVAL_TIME IS NOT NULL OR NVL(mng.ERROR_STATUS, '0' ) = '7000' ) */ AND mng.CREATE_DATE > TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR( SYSDATE-3, 'YYYYMMDD' )) and nvl(site.alarm, '0') = '1' and mng.org_cd = site.org_cd and mng.branch_cd = site.branch_cd and mng.site_cd = site.site_cd
